doc.name: mirrored

syntax.example: set the mirrored of player to {true | false}

doc.summary: Specifies whether a player displays the video frames in "mirrored" mode.

examples.example: set the mirrored of player "myPlayer" to true

doc.description:
Use the mirrored property to flip horizontally the frames of a player.
Value:
The mirrored of a player is true or false.
By default, the mirrored property of a newly created player is set to false.
